nodes.text: Razelfiin was a female Tynnan and leader of her people on the Expansion Region world of Tynna shortly before the onset of the Clone Wars in 22 BBY. Two months after her election by lottery, the Tynna Central Government Building in Lutris collapsed due to a stone mite infestation. Razelfiin attributed the collapse to a terrorist attack and, angered by a lack of Republic and Jedi intervention, she subsequently declared her intention to contact Confederacy of Independent Systems leader Count Dooku as soon as she could procure a new building from which to govern. Razelfiin eventually pushed Tynna into the Confederacy, but the planet rejoined the Republic before the end of the Clone Wars in 19 BBY.

Razelfiin first appeared in HoloNet News Vol. 531 #53, an article on the HoloNet News website in 2002. The entry for Tynna in the 2009 reference book The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia mistakenly refers to Razelfiin as male.
